section:
The Sokarans surrender. Their captain has been killed in the battle, and his marines have had the fight knocked out of them. The war galley isn’t carrying any cargo, but you find an
on the body of the captain, and a chest in his cabin, which contains 150 Shards. You have to hand out 50 Shards to your crew, but you can add to your Adventure Sheet. You leave the galley to limp back to Yellowport while you sail on. .
